article.name: What is the source IP address for Webhook and other services’ alert notifications from Mackerel?
article.title: What is the source IP address for Webhook and other services’ alert notifications from Mackerel?
article.body:
Below is the range of source IP addresses for notification requests from Mackerel. In the event of a change, an announcement will be made in advance.

  • 52.193.111.118/32
  • 52.196.125.133/32
  • 13.113.213.40/32
  • 52.197.186.229/32
  • 52.198.79.40/32
  • 13.114.12.29/32
  • 13.113.240.89/32
  • 52.68.245.9/32

  • 13.112.142.176/32

  • See the following page for destination IP addresses for requests from mackerel-agent.

    • What is Mackerel's IP address and port number?

Records

  • Established on May 8, 2014
  • Amended on Aug 21, 2017
